sgpack-sghtml-image-edit-desc: Path to the icon used to jump to the top of the page
sgpack-sghtml-image-top-desc: Path to the icon used to edit paragraphs
ddinsert-selecttitle: Text shown if something needs to be selected in a dropdown
newarticle-selecttitle: Text shown on the template selector when creating a new page
addwhosonline-pmenu: Text used for the Who's Online personal menu link
parseradds_link_norel: Error message shown if #rel attribute is missing
parseradds_link_nopage: Error message shown if #link linked page is missing
parseradds_link_illegalpage: Error message shown if #link has an invalid page name
parseradds_userinfo_illegal: Error message shown if userinfo was provided with an invalid username
